title: Bug 121682: Exception throws when exporting data from a table containing highlight/map
description:
The following exception occurs when attempting to export data from an attached report:

Exception throws when export data from attached report.
OB: When trying to export data from a table that contains a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row, an exception is thrown.
EB: The software should allow for the successful export of data from a table that contains a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Add a table that has a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row.
2. Preview the attached report.
3. Attempt to export the data.
